path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Christmas Doge Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has various privileges including authorizing addresses, changing maximum token amount per wallet, withdrawing BNBs to marketing receiver address, and changing cooldown status. Additionally, authorized addresses can perform multiple actions such as changing transaction limits, including/excluding from dividends/fees, and modifying fees.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change maximum token amount per wallet
findings.description: The owner or authorized addresses have the privilege to modify the maximum token amount per wallet.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can withdraw BNBs to the marketing receiver address
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to withdraw BNBs to the marketing receiver address without proper restrictions.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change cooldown status
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify the cooldown status, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change the maximum transaction amount limit
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount limit, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from dividends
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to include or exclude certain addresses from receiving dividends.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from fees
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to include or exclude certain addresses from fees.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from transaction amount limit
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to include or exclude specific transactions from the overall transaction amount limit.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from cooldown interval
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify the cooldown interval, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change liquidity, reflection and marketing fees
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to modify liquidity, reflection, and marketing fees which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change liquidity and marketing fee receivers
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to alter the recipients of liquidity and marketing fees.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change swap threshold and enable/disable swap
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the ability to modify swap settings, including changing the swap threshold and enabling or disabling swaps.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change target liquidity values
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify target liquidity values, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change distribution criteria
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the ability to modify distribution criteria, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change distribution GAS
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to alter the distribution of GAS, which may lead to unintended consequences.
